comment: He is the best. He is pretty chill. There are three essays. He talked and explained through each one, basically giving a step by step tutorial on how he would like them to be written. He is very lenient with his grading. Each essay assignment had multiple topic choices and they were very fun and current. There are some discussions but very easy.
Professor Fuller has been the best professor I have had. 10/10 would recommend to anyone who needs to take English 1101.

Guys take him as your ENGL 1101 Prof

He's a great professor to have.

Throughout the semester you'll complete 3 outlines, 3 rough drafts, and 3 final drafts. He provides feedback on the outlines and there's an in-class peer review of your rough draft. At the end of the semester, he averages out all of your grades for each type of assignment into one grade. His lectures are super approachable and he's really nice.
Professor Fuller is awesome! He grades fairly and is clear with his feedback. Classes were interesting and he keeps the class engaged. definitely take him!
Very funny and entertaining, fair grader,
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Hilarious--Graded by few things

comment: He is a superior professor. He's interesting & witty. I can genuinely say that I know way more now than I did before about English after taking him. He does grade intricately on your essays but it is to help you do better next time. 5 points to your final grade if you submit a resume. Take him, trust me. My final grade was a 100%!
This class was so much fun! He dressed up for halloween and if we dressed up we got extra credit! He was so funny and the lectures were actually entertaining! Take his class!!
Makes some good videos and is funny. Looked forward to class everyday. 1000000/10
He was my favorite professor by far! The class was always entertaining and he keeps people engaged. Also a very easy grader and easy to talk to about grades.

I LOVE Professor Fuller. He is so fun and makes class enjoyable. He truly loves what he does. An A+ is easy and achievable. 7 major assignments. (3 essays, 1 quiz, 2 annotated bibs, 1 research proposal). No tests. Extra Credit offered. In-class group work, but super easy. Also, he is a very chill grader and provides amazing feedback. 10000/10!
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: He is very understanding and grades generously. His late work policy doesn't deduct points till 24 hours after the due date. He enjoys his job and is passionate.
Recommend a very easy and funny prof . If you struggle, he'll help you out a lot. He makes learning fun.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Graded by few things

comment: Professor Fuller is the best prof ever. He's so funny, class is easy and fun. I thoroughly enjoyed his class. 100% take him.

Prof. Fuller was great. He tries very hard to make the class fun and you can tell he truly cares about his students and wants everyone to succeed. Attendance is mandatory but you do get 3 free absences. If you have the opportunity you should take him.
Amazing and fun teacher.

If you're taking this class take him. He's the best easiest professor. There are 3 big assignments like papers, and he grades them easily. You get 3 free absences after that its 5 points off. Extra credit however is worth 5 points and it's easy. Easy fun class.

Awesome. I couldn't reccomend him enough. Very chill, lectures are simple. Only a few essay's that are easy (unless you don't like essay's), grading rubric is clear and easy to follow. If you follow the grading rubrics, it's a guaranteed A+. I did take this course online.

He is truly the most hilarious and chill professor I have ever had. No homework and is a very lenient grader. Take him. Has a limit of 3 absences with a deduction of 5 points but gives you the opportunity to gain 5 points extra credit if you submit a resume to him.

Best English class I've ever taken. Lecture style was fun, content was interesting, and work load was very light. Only 2 essays w/ annotated bibs, a quiz, and a short research proposal. This was a hybrid class, and online work was just for the 5% participation grade. Prof. Fuller is an easy grader and very chill to talk to. Highly recommend!
Very little assignments, but he grades with a clear purpose and tell you want you need to work on. All in all loved his class and was a very fun teacher.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Hilarious--Graded by few things

comment: Honestly, he was a very funny professor, I appreciated his jokes a lot, he would make my day. He is a good professor and he actually makes class fun. For ENG1102, we only had 2 big papers to right and the rest of the other papers were super easy to write. Also, attendance is mandatory, but his classes aren't boring tbh.

Prof. Fuller is a wonderful professor, his lectures are enjoyable and the content is structured very well. I highly recommend his class. As long as you stay on top of your assignments, and put effort into your papers, you will succeed in his class. I am going to miss his class.

Fuller is an amazing professor. you have a few essays and one of them is about a film/book of your choice. As long as your essays are decently structured and have correct grammer youll get an easy A. You get extra credit for going to class, but attendence is not mandatory.

Words can not explain how awesome this Professor is. He is not a tough grader. Although he does that attendance is it not mandatory, as long as when you show up you participate. Hands down the best Professor at KSU.

Great at making classes interactive and makes sure you know the stuff you're learning. Grading for papers is really straight forward and he gives you a lot of freedom on essay topics. Watched some really interesting movies through the semester and had great discussions and analysis. Really going to miss this class

Do yourself a favor and take him. He is a very understanding and nice guy (you can tell he likes teaching English). We wrote essays about movies and did weekly to bi-weekly short discussions about questions in the textbook (he uploads it), and they were honestly a completion grade. If you put the work in, you will pass it class super easy.
Coolest professor at Kennesaw State University, you should defiantly take Prof. Fuller.
Im glad that I decided to take this professor because he only has 3 essays and very easy assignments throughout semester. There should be no reason why you should get any A in this course!
Take this professor if you want that A because he grades you on weekly responses, two take home exams, and a comparison essay.
Very easy class. Too easy that if you dont do your work on time, youll finish with a B. Just do the work before the due date, and youre fine. Im taking him again next semester
rating_tags: Graded by few things--Clear grading criteria

comment: This is the best English professor that I had for English 1101 and English 2110. I recommend this professor!
This class is the easiest class that I have taken since I got to KSU.
This is one of the easiest english classes that I have taken in college!

TAKE THIS PROFESSOR!!! Especially if u have a heavier course load. Graded by only 3 essays, 3 pages each (the first was 2 pages) Very easy prompts as long as u pay somewhat attention to lectures. Were also graded by short responses (only for completion), outlines, and rough drafts so its impossible to fall behind. He gives very helpful feedback

Best professor I've ever had so far. He is so genuinely caring. Entire class is just 3 major grades and a few minor grades (like weekly questionnaires). If you know how to write, it will be an easy A, and you will love him as a professor. I even had talks with him after class about our interests, and he even wrote me a recommendation for college.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Graded by few things

comment: One of the best professors I ever took in my life ! If I could take him a million times I definitely would!!!
Probably the best and the easiest professor to take for English!!

Prof. Fuller is a pretty cool guy. He makes his content relatable to the real world, rather than giving his students outdated novels to read. After writing assignments, he actually gives great constructive criticism on your writing to help you improve. He also gives students the option to write about what they like. Overall, he is a great professor
One of the best English professors!!
Take this professor, you won't regret your decision!
Please take him if you want an A, I recommend taking him!!

There are no (multiple choice/ fill in the blank) tests, just essay's. If you follow the rubric for the writing assignments/essays and put in some effort, you're almost guaranteed to get a good grade. He's always willing to answer questions if you have them and provide help. Make sure to keep up with turn-in dates, they'll fly right past you.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--Clear grading criteria

comment: I recommend taking Dr. Fuller, in my opinion I wish I can take him for Eng1102!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Easiest class you will ever take. He is really helpful always available outside of class only three essay and he is not a hard grader. TAKE HIM
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--Amazing lectures

comment: Take this Professor. He is the best prof. I had my first semester. His essays are very clear on what to do and they are not that hard. He provides great video lectures on YouTube. You can really tell that he puts effort and cares for his students. My only wish is that Professor Fuller taught ENGL1102 so I can take him again.
Amazing teacher. Assigns work on Monday and asks for it all on Sunday. Only 3 essays throughout the whole semester and knows what he's talking about.

TAKE THIS CLASS. I do not even like writing but he made it so much better. He has only four essays which he does not grade too hard. He has the full week of what we are doing so you can get ahead if you want to. He is such a great teacher take him you will not go wrong.
Literally the easiest class you will ever take in college.

I really enjoyed his asynchronous online course. We had work assigned at the begging of the week and it was due by the end of the week. Everything was clear and straight forward. He's also really good at communication. I'd email him super late at night and he'd always respond ASAP! Solid teacher.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Participation matters

comment: This class was amazing! You have to read two short storys' a week ( by short I mean less than a page). And then each week you have to write a 1 page essay comparing the two essays or just writing about one of them. And all the first 7 essays are due after seven weeks not every week. As long as you read the stories and participate it's fun, easy A.

He is a really chill dude, he gives you a 24 hour grace period for every assignment after it is due. So if you just do the work its an easy A. Only 3 essays all semester and pretty simple to do if you change your commas and periods to font 14 and ever other punctuation mark to font 13.

fuller is great he gives a lot of essays to do but they only have to be a page or 2, hes a very forgiving grader, and the final assignments seem like a lot of work but they really arent. you will read a lot. highly recommend.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Get ready to read--So many papers

comment: Awesome guy. Very nice and smooth in learning. Professor fuller can be lenient in grading for late work, however, do not take advantage. He's a really nice and very helpful in and out of class.
Professor Fuller is great honestly. The class is really easy, and the tests are take home. If you pay a moderate amount of attention in class, youll definitely pass.

Probably the coolest professor you will ever have, simply just show up and do the work he assigns and you will end up with an A. He's really chill and laid back so there's really nothing to worry about in this class

Literally the best lit professor you can have. He cares about class so attending class is actually fun. The assigned reading is usually enjoyable to read and not very long, and it makes class more enjoyable if you contribute. He responds to emails quickly, and he's overall just an awesome guy.

If you don't like participating don't take this class. He grades you off of participation. You get 3 excused absences and after that he takes 5 points off your final grade. reading every night and discussion questions. He also has a random name generator for you to discuss the homework in front of the class. Also an "informal" presentation
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Great professor who understands his students. Any STEM major should take Fuller's classes. You will read but it's never anything heavy or time-consuming. Great class.

Lots of reading but that is expected of a Lit class. He makes discussions interesting. I honestly thought it would be another boring Shakespeare class but I got a good bit out of it. He took a lot of different texts to use. I even actively participated in some really thought provoking conversations. Good guy. 9/10.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Inspirational--GRADED BY FEW THINGS

comment: Prof Fuller is hands down one of the best English teachers I have had. Though attendance is mandatory he does allow you to have three absences without penalty. His feedback on papers is very clear and his lectures are fun.

Prof Fuller is an awesome dude and you would be lucky to have him as your professor. You can tell that he really does care about what he teaches but he doesn't make you go out of your way to do unnecessary work.

Great guy, understands all of the material he is teaching and makes it easy to learn. Class is mandatory, but you get 3 unexcused absences before he docks 5 points from your final grade which is understandable. Most of you grades are participation and the essays are graded lightly.
I really enjoyed taking his class, he was caring and very helpful on all of our essays.
